body.title: Corniglia Weather Guide
body.subtitle: Mediterranean climate with mild winters and warm summers. Best conditions April-June and September-October.

features.title: Spring (Apr-May)

features.title: Winter (Nov-Mar)
features.description: Mild but rainy 10-15째C. Many restaurants closed. Authentic local life, dramatic seas.

features.title: Elevated Position
features.description: Corniglia's cliff top location means more breeze and sun exposure. Cooler than sea-level villages.

features.title: What to Pack
features.description: Layers essential year-round. Sun protection, comfortable shoes, light rain jacket. Sweater for evenings.
